details.content:
Last week saw important progress on a few projects we're working on. It ended with a great conference on Saturday:Open Tech.Despite being on the weekend, you could find most of the ODI tech team there. It's safe to say that the conference was a great success with plenty of interesting and inspiring talks.

Jeni attended the Open Data User Group meeting, where we presented an updated benefits case for opening up a specific data set. She also went totheShakespeare Reviewlaunch and spoke at the Eduserve Symposium.On Friday, Jeni sat in on White October's user testing of theOpen Data Certificate.

Sam had a rather frustrating week working with Drupal. We hope that his and our woes are soon over.James and Stuart spent also time working on theDataset Metadata Survey.

Tom spend most of his days forbackground work on an European project proposals. He and I also worked on a guide on how to publish big data. We plan to share more at the end of the next sprint.

Lastly, we are virtually ready to start our first research project!
